title.rendered: Sparks: Ideas to Ignite Your Business Growth

content.rendered:
All business owners want to make it big, but only a few do. In Sparks, author Shweta Jhajharia is brutally honest about what it takes to achieve such a goal.

Jhajharia draws on proven strategies and real-life stories to offer powerful ideas for sustainable double-digit growth. Her practical advice is grounded in her personal experience of working with hundreds of business owners. Learn how to:

  • Create an unlimited marketing budget,
  • Deal with your worst employees who may even be your best people,
  • Develop a mindset for growth and
  • Implement the 4Ds of productivity.
